## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/indirectstubsmanager">IndirectStubsManager</a> implementation for the host architecture, e.g.

OrcX86&#95;64. (See OrcArchitectureSupport.h).

Definition at line 378 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/indirectionutils-h">IndirectionUtils.h</a>.
